mapper.insert: insert into users(userid, userpwd, joindate, first_name, last_name, mail_accept, status, profile_path) values(#{userId}, #{password}, sysdate, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{mailReceptionStatus}, #{accountType}, #{profilePath})
insert into store(storeid, name, phone, address, latitude, longitude) values(#{storeId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})

insert into store_details(storeid, notice, status, way_to_find, manage_week_time, manage_sat_time, manage_sun_time, store_cnt, certificate_path) values(#{storeId}, '', 'START', '', '오전11:00~오후09:00', '오전11:00~오후09:00', '오전11:00~오후09:00', 0, #{certificatePath})
mapper.update: update store_details set notice = #{notice}, manage_week_time = #{manageWeekTime}, manage_sat_time = #{manageSatTime}, manage_sun_time = #{manageSunTime}, store_cnt = #{storeCnt} where storeid = #{storeId}
